discourse_list.title: Special Episode of The Schuppi & El Pro "Meet The Makers" Featuring Derek Flossman of PECU

content.content: Special Episode of The Schuppi & El Pro “Meet The Makers” Featuring Derek Flossman of PECU After having an interesting conversation last week with @g_dip we thought it it the right time to get a CoreUnit facilitator as a guest - starting the “Meet the Makers” series with our most beloved @Derek! He is giving some insights how Protocol Engineering is working, L2s, how he deals with distractions and even giving some alpha leak (not going to say where exactly)!  02:50 Happy Hour!   @flipflopflapdelegate having a Porn Star Martini from Bulka z Masłem in Wrocław, Poland  @ultraschuppi having an Ichnusa from Sardinia, Italy  @Derek having an OG Budweiser (the good stuff)   09:00 Derek introducing himself and how he got to MakerDAO 15:00 How is life at PECU? 21:00 How to deal with distractions? 25:00 Distractions vs Generating Buyin 29:30 Stepping down as Mandated Actors by CoreUnit Members 33:00 Tornado Cash as a threat for contributors 37:30 Why decentralization matters 39:00 Block-Censoring 45:00 L2 51:00 NFTs 54:00 Cross-team alignment  Enjoy!
content.GPT-summary: The post is a special episode of a podcast series called "Meet the Makers" featuring Derek Flossman of PECU. The podcast covers various topics related to Protocol Engineering, L2s, distractions, stepping down as mandated actors, Tornado Cash, decentralization, block-censoring, NFTs, and cross-team alignment. The podcast is informative and provides insights into the workings of PECU and the MakerDAO ecosystem.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal

content.content: A must watch!! I’d love if I could be passive audience at these. Always fail to schedule an hour for catchup.
Thank you for the opportunity to chat guys, that was great fun!
Interesting research post by Brock Smedley of Flashbots with regards to what @Derek spoke-on during our chat: Flashbots MEV-Booooost!!
